value.title: How to use Azure Automation with PowerShell | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Automation with a Windows Machine with PowerShell. Azure Automation makes it easy to do common tasks like, scaling Azure SQL Database up and down and starting and stopping a virtual machine.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: How to use Azure Kubernetes Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Developers can drastically simplify how they build and run container-based solutions without deep Kubernetes expertise. In this video, Brendan Burns joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss GA of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).   For more information:  • Quickstart: Deploy an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster

value.title: How to work with files in Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to work with files that you’ve uploaded to Azure App Service. Watch to find out what the different options are for interacting with the file system and your deployed applications in the Azure portal.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Protect your web applications using WAF with Azure Front Door | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sharad Agrawal and Teresa Yao join Scott Hanselman to introduce Web Application Firewall (WAF) with Azure Front Door. They show how to configure and block malicious attacks against web applications at the edge of Microsoft's network. WAF with Azure Front Door is the best solution to help protect your

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7G_oDLON7Us" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What are work or school, and Microsoft personal accounts? | One Dev Question: Jean-Marc Prieur
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Jean-Marc Prieur, a Principal Program Manager Program Manager working on the Microsoft identity platform, explains the difference between work and school accounts, and personal Microsoft accounts.   Get more information at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in healthcare
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in healthcare that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

value.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Every modern business is powered by applications, such as internal procurement applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, retail websites, and third-party products. As your business prepares for digital transformation, it’s important to begin modernizing and migrating your applications and infrastructure to the cloud. Azure is a key component of that process. You can choose to migrate, modernize, or build cloud native solutions depending on your business goals and how you assess your application portfolio. This is a strategic decision. You’ll be able to choose the path that’s right for your organization.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Putting it all together with Azure SQL

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.
